"Red Cliff" is a historical epic film directed by Zhang Yimao and produced by Huayang Group. The film stars Wu Jing, Gong Li, Bai Fei, Wang Xiaodai, and others.
The film tells the story of the war between the three kingdoms (Qing, Shu, Liu) during the Northern Song Dynasty  (906-970 A. D.).  The main characters include Emperor Taizong (r. 934-975 A.
